title: $1000/month Remote Household Moving Sales Consultant (Long Distance/Interstate)
description:
Earn $3-$5/hr + Bonuses | Remote Sales Role with Hot Leads | Recession-Proof Industry



Experience in US long-distance/interstate moving sales is highly preferred. Strong candidates with US phone sales or logistics sales experience will also be considered.



We are Stanford Van Lines, a leading long-distance moving company in the US. We are building our remote sales team and looking for talented professionals in the Philippines who can connect with our American customers, understand their needs, and close deals.



About the Role:

This is a fast-paced, phone-based sales environment focused on CLOSING. You will guide customers through their moving journey, provide accurate estimates, and persuade them to choose our premium service based on value, not just price. We provide the hot leads, training, and scripts—you provide the excellent communication and drive to book moves.



COMPENSATION:

-Hourly Rate: $3 USD/hour during training, moving to $5 USD/hour upon successful completion.

-Performance Bonuses: Earn additional cash bonuses, incentives, and spiffs for exceeding sales targets and quotas. Your total earnings grow with your performance.



WHAT SUCCESS LOOKS LIKE:

-Handle inbound and outbound calls from qualified leads

-Provide accurate moving estimates using our system

-Maintain organized CRM updates and consistent follow-ups

-Meet or exceed booking and conversion targets



WORK SCHEDULE (Philippine Time):

-This is a full-time, fully remote position.

-Schedule: You must be available to work US Pacific Time (PST) hours, typically corresponding to late night to early morning in the Philippines (e.g., 11:00 PM - 7:00 AM PHT). 11am to 7pm Central Time 

-Days: 5-6 days per week, including weekends (Saturday & Sunday are mandatory). Monday availability is crucial due to high lead volume.



YOU ARE THE RIGHT FIT IF YOU ARE:

Coachable, Self-Motivated, Competitive, Well-Spoken, Hungry, Responsible, Persuasive, Respectful, Optimistic, Empathetic, Resourceful, and Personable.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:



-BOOK MOVES as your primary goal.

-Respond promptly to new, hot leads.

-Make professional outbound calls and follow scripts.

-Use our CRM to track leads, estimates, and bookings.

-Gather inventory details and create accurate moving quotes.

-Provide a superior customer experience and educate clients on our value.

-Overcome objections with proven techniques.

-Conduct diligent follow-ups to secure bookings and prevent cancellations.



REQUIREMENTS (Non-Negotiable):



-Proven experience in US Long Distance or Interstate Moving Sales.

-Excellent American English communication skills (verbal and written), with a clear, neutral accent for customer calls.

-Experience with Moving Industry CRM software (SmartMoving or Granot is a major plus).

-Ability to calculate cubic feet for estimates.

-Strong interpersonal skills to build quick rapport.

-A stable internet connection, a quiet workspace, and a professional headset.

-Must be comfortable working the night/early morning schedule (PST hours).



TRAINING & ONBOARDING:

-Paid training covering scripts, systems, and sales process

-Performance evaluation after training before moving to full hourly rate



WHY JOIN OUR REMOTE TEAM?



-NO COLD CALLING! Work with pre-qualified, hot leads from customers who requested our quotes.

-PAID TRAINING & SUPPORT: Receive comprehensive training on our systems, industry, and sales process.

-ESTABLISHED PROCESSES: We provide everything you need—scripts, rebuttals, and full support.

-RECESSION-PROOF INDUSTRY: Join a stable, essential service business that thrives in any economy.

-GROWTH OPPORTUNITY: This is a chance to build a stable, long-term career with a reputable US company.



HOW TO APPLY (Follow these steps exactly):



-Record a Voice Message: Using your phone or computer, record a short (1-2 minute) voice message in English.



Message Content: Clearly state:

-Your name.

-Your specific experience in US long-distance moving sales.

-Your past sales achievements (e.g., conversion rate, monthly bookings).

-Why you are a great fit for this remote role.



Submit Your Application:



-Apply here on OnlineJobs.ph with your resume.

-In the application message, include a link to your voice recording. You can upload the file to a free service like Google Drive, Vocaroo, or WeTransfer and share the link.



Applications without a voice message link will not be considered. If you are a strong fit, we will contact you for the next steps.



Join Stanford Van Lines and build a strong, stable career with us!

title: Real Estate Operations Lead
description:
PropZap is building a next-generation real estate platform designed to expand across North America.



We are pioneers in how modern real estate companies should be built — powered by strong systems, smart technology, data-driven decision-making, and operational efficiency.



We’re building with intention.

With structure.

With technology at the core.

With performance that compounds over time.



Our goal is to create a brand that sets the standard. A company that leads. A platform built to scale intelligently and sustainably across markets.



And for the right person, this isn’t just a job inside that company.



It’s a front-row seat to its growth.



--------------------------------------------------------------



Role: Real Estate Operations Lead

Location: Philippines (Remote)

Shift: Night Shift — Canada MST

Role Type: Full-Time, Long-Term

Compensation: Top-tier salary + performance bonuses + growth-based increases



We believe strong operators deserve strong compensation. If you take ownership and help us grow confidently, you will be rewarded accordingly.



--------------------------------------------------------------



Why This Role Is a Big Opportunity



This isn’t just about processing files.



This is about helping build a company that scales smoothly.



As PropZap expands into new markets and increases transaction volume, you’ll be part of strengthening the operational backbone that allows that growth to happen confidently.



As we grow, your scope grows.



More responsibility.

More visibility.

More leadership potential over time.



If you’re looking for long-term stability and upward movement instead of hopping between short-term roles, this is that kind of opportunity.



--------------------------------------------------------------



Your Core Responsibilities:

You will own and lead the backend operations that power our agents and client experience.

Full Real Estate Operations Leadership (Hands-On)



You will personally execute and oversee:

- Transaction and listing coordination

• Contract preparation, amendments, compliance, and document management

• MLS drafts, uploads, and accuracy checks

• FINTRAC, signatures, deadlines, and audit-ready files

• CRM hygiene, pipelines, task boards, and workflow tracking

• Calendar management, reminders, and operational follow-ups



You will ensure nothing slips, nothing is messy, and everything is executed with precision.



Listing & Marketing Operations:

- Coordinate photos, drone, measurements, floorplans, and virtual tours

• Manage listing timelines, deliverables, and launch readiness

• Prepare polished listing descriptions and marketing instructions

• Oversee signs, lockboxes, open houses, and showing instructions

• Maintain organized listing folders, media libraries, and assets

• Coordinate with marketing vendors and internal resources



Agent & Client Backend Support:

- Act as the primary operational support behind agents

• Communicate professionally with clients, lawyers, vendors, and partners

• Track conditions, deadlines, and next steps

• Ensure agents can focus on selling while operations run flawlessly



Systems, Process, and Scale:

- Maintain clean, reliable, and scalable operational systems

• Identify inefficiencies and proactively improve workflows

• Document processes and help build SOPs as the business evolves

• Support leadership with operational insights and execution

• Assist in hiring, training, and onboarding future operations tea
mbers



Who This Role Is Great For



Someone who enjoys ownership.



Someone who likes being the person everything runs through smoothly.



Someone who wants to grow inside a scaling company.



• Experience in real estate operations (U.S. or Canadian experience is a plus)

• Organized and detail-oriented

• Comfortable managing multiple files at once

• Clear and professional communicator

• Proactive and solutions-focused

• Interested in long-term growth



Highly Ideal:

• Experience mentoring others

• Experience improving workflows

• Experience in fast-growing environments



--------------------------------------------------------------



What You Gain



• Above-market compensation

• Performance bonuses tied to impact

• Long-term stability inside a scaling company

• Direct exposure to leadership

• A clear path toward greater operational responsibility

• A role that expands as the company expands



Imagine being two or three years into a company that has expanded across markets — and knowing you helped build the operational backbone that supported that growth.



That’s what this role offers.



--------------------------------------------------------------



How to Apply



Send the following to: 



• Resume

• Portfolio (if available)

• 2-minute intro video introducing yourself

• Summary of your real estate operations experience

• Expected monthly salary (PHP)

• Internet speed test link

• Any DISC test result



Subject Line: Real Estate Operations Lead – Your Name



If you’re ready to grow with a company that’s expanding — and build something meaningful behind the scenes — we’d love to hear from you.

title: Creative, enthusiastic VA
description:
I’m looking for an creative, enthusiastic VA who is seeking an opportunity to grow with me for a long term career. You must have good English skills, basic computer/internet skills, knowledge of Google Docs, pay attention to detail, eager to learn and outgoing personality. Knowledge of Canva with the ability to design decent social media posts, be personable and willing to take initiative. Attention to detail is a huge plus. I have multiple avenues in my business you will be helping me with. One is a woman's organization so you do need to be a woman as you will be interacting in the group. (Sorry, guys!)



My company is growing and your growth with it is only limited by your desire to learn and willingness to work. I’m looking for someone who will be dedicated and build a long term career with me. The more initiative you take, the more opportunity you will have. I want you to succeed in becoming an invaluable tea
mber and have no problem providing training and more so you can learn.



Tasks will include basic admin tasks, managing the general
 box, updating files, posting to social media, monitoring forums and helping with membership management. I need someone who isn’t afraid to communicate with people when needed and to think ahead to keep things moving. You must be very attentive to detail ,making sure you're being thorough with your work and checking it before you submit it. 



The position is for full time, with paid holidays, vacation and sick leave, as well as 13th month. As we grow, so will your responsibilities and salary. If you have another full time job, please do not apply. If you have a part time job, please include the hours you work in your response. The position will start as soon as possible.



Show me how detailed you are and how well you follow directions. Please respond with a cover letter telling me why you would like this position-don't be so formal, let me see your personality! Include your resume and some samples of social media designs you've created. Design samples are a MUST to be considered. Be sure to put “Attention to Detail" in the subject line. Applicants not including all of this will not be considered, as this shows me you don’t follow directions well.



Thanks for applying!

title: Phone Sales Representative - Earn $10k+ Monthly
description:
This is your opportunity to be part of a fast-growing 9-figure US brand where your hard work and talent can create life-changing results. We are looking for passionate and motivated Outbound Sales Agents who are ready to take their careers to the next level.





Why This Role Stands Out

600 USD Base pay OR Commissions whichever is higher

Uncapped Earnings – Our agents consistently earn $3,000 to $10,000+ USD per month through commissions.

Steady Payouts –  Salaries are paid every two weeks without delay.

Proven Success – Even our newest tea
mbers are earning a minimum of $2,000 USD monthly.

Thriving Culture – No toxicity, just a supportive environment where your performance is recognized and rewarded.





Schedule & Breaks

6 days per week

12-hour shifts (US business hours)

Includes two 1-hour breaks and two 15-minute breaks to keep you refreshed and productive.

Full-time focus required – this is your only role.





Non-Negotiables (Please Read Before Applying)

You must be able to work 6 days per week, 12 hours per day (with breaks included)

If this doesn’t fit your availability or expectations, this role is not for you.





What We Expect

Be performance-driven and motivated by results.

Speak and write English fluently and confidently.

Be coachable and follow our proven sales process.

Have a stable internet connection and reliable work setup.

Be fully committed – this is not a side gig.



 A Career with Real Growth

This isn’t just another sales job. It’s a chance to build a long-term, rewarding career with a 9-figure brand that is continuing to grow. If you are ambitious, disciplined, and ready to be part of something big, this opportunity is for you.

Compensation

Follow up with interested prospects

Present product and subscription options



Track performance metrics



Requirements



Sales experience



Comfortable selling over the phone



Competitive and goal-oriented

title: Sales Closer (Warm Leads) – Earn Up to $10,000+/Month
description:
If you’re consistently hitting targets but feel limited by capped commissions or low-quality leads, this is your chance to change that. This role is built for closers who want serious earning potential, long-term growth, and real upside.



The Opportunity

$600 USD base OR commission (whichever is higher)

Uncapped commissions

Top performers earn $8,000–$10,000+ per month

Just 200 focused calls per day

Warm, pre-qualified leads only

Non-negotiable: 12-hour availability window with 9 active working hours

Schedule: EST shift, 6 days per week

This schedule is demanding by design. It’s how high performers earn more and grow faster.



What You’ll Do

Follow up with warm leads and interested buyers

Close high-ticket sales and subscription plans

Lead confident, solution-focused conversations

Track performance accurately



Why Top Closers Choose This Role

No commission caps

No cold calling

Competitive, growth-driven sales environment

Clear path to higher income and advancement



Who This Is For

Experienced sales professionals with phone or remote closing experience

Closers who thrive on accountability, growth, and winning

This is not a comfort job.

It’s a role for closers who want more money, more growth, and more control over their future.

If that’s you, apply and show us what you can do.

title: PowerPoint & Workbook Designer
description:
I am looking for a skilled, detail-oriented Virtual Assistant who can:



• Design professional PowerPoint slides (12–15 slides per week for Weeks 1–6)

• Create a cohesive, beautifully branded digital workbook

• Follow structured outlines and turn them into polished, executive-level visuals

• Maintain consistent branding across slides and workbook



This is not just slide formatting — I need someone who understands layout, hierarchy, and clean, premium design.



???? PROJECT SCOPE:

???? 6 PowerPoints Total



12–15 slides each



Executive but modern aesthetic



Clean layout (not cluttered)



Strategic use of white space



Strong typography



Cohesive branding



???? 1 Digital Workbook



6 weekly sections



Cover design



Welcome page



Reflection pages



Fillable sections



Action planning worksheets



Cohesive brand look with slides



I will provide:



Slide outlines with exact wording for key statements



Teaching points



Section structure



Branding direction



Vision for tone and positioning



You will:



Execute design



Format professionally



Suggest layout improvements if needed



Ensure consistency across all materials



DESIGN STYLE:

Minimal



Executive



Strategic



Empowering



Transformational



It should feel premium, structured, and powerful.



???? IDEAL SKILLS:



? Strong Canva and/or PowerPoint experience

? Clean, premium design aesthetic

? Experience designing workbooks, planners, or digital courses

? Strong English comprehension

? Attention to detail

? Organized file management

? Ability to meet deadlines



???? DELIVERABLES:



• 6 completed PowerPoint decks

• 1 fully designed digital workbook

• Editable Canva or PowerPoint files

• Organized shared folder with final assets



Please include:



Links to PowerPoint or workbook designs you have created



Your rate (project-based or hourly)



Estimated timeline for completing 6 decks + workbook



The word ALIGN in your application subject line



Why you believe you are a good fit for a transformational leadership brand





I am looking for someone who sees this as building something meaningful — not just completing slides.



If you are creative, organized, and take pride in polished work, I would love to work with you.

title: Virtual Sales Operations Support
description:
THIS JOB POSTING WILL CLOSE ON FRIDAY FEBRUARY 27, 2026. 



Independent Contractor | Approximately 20 hours per week

Remote role | U.S. business hours required



Role Overview

This role supports a founder-led consulting business where priorities evolve quickly and preparation sometimes happens close to execution. Your job is to bring structure, follow-through, and accuracy behind the scenes so sales activity, executive meetings, and internal workflows stay organized and moving forward without constant oversight.

This is not a sales or closing role. It is an operational and executive support role for someone who stays steady under pressure, tracks details naturally, and takes pride in clean execution.



This Role Is NOT a Fit If

• You need stable, unchanging processes to work well

• You get frustrated when priorities shift

• You dislike last-minute requests

• You need highly detailed instructions before acting

• You want a sales or relationship-ownership role

• You are uncomfortable supporting live executive-level calls

• You are new to using AI tools and expect to learn them on the job



Key Responsibilities

Prospect Research & Meeting Preparation

• Maintain strong grammar, spelling, and clarity

• Use AI tools to speed research and summarization while verifying accuracy



Sales Pipeline & CRM Management

• Manage day-to-day pipeline activity in Nutshell CRM

• Update stages, notes, next steps, and follow-up dates

• Flag stalled opportunities or missing actions

• Keep records clean and easy to scan



Task & Workflow Coordination

• Track sales-related tasks and reminders in Monday

• Document requests and actions taken

• Ensure follow-through as priorities change



Weekly Call List Preparation

• Prepare a weekly call list based on active prospects and conversations

• Ensure each entry includes context, background, and clear next steps

• Log outcomes and create follow-up actions after calls



Monthly Executive Webinar Support (Live Participation)

• Attend monthly executive webinars live (camera off)

• Support Zoom execution, including recording and participant management

• Support LinkedIn Live when applicable

• Assist with preparation, invitations, reminders, and follow-up

• Capture engagement, questions, and follow-up needs in the CRM



Scripted Outreach Support (Limited Scope)

• Execute outreach only when directed, using provided scripts and templates



What Success Looks Like

• The pipeline stays organized without daily oversight

• Meetings and webinars feel prepared, even with short notice

• Executive calls are documented with clear follow-through

• Written work is consistently clean and professional

• AI is used to increase speed without sacrificing accuracy



Tools You Will Use

• Nutshell CRM

• Monday

• LinkedIn and LinkedIn Sales Navigator

• Google Workspace

• Zoom

• AI tools for research and documentation



Hands-on experience with LinkedIn, Sales Navigator, and AI tools is required.

$10–13/hour depending on experience and demonstrated capability.

Performance review at 90 days with compensation adjustment tied to ownership and system improvement milestones.



Application Process



To apply, complete the required application task at this link: 

Applications submitted without completing the task in full will not be reviewed.



Final candidates will be asked to complete a Kolbe A™ assessment. We use Kolbe to understand natural working styles and ensure strong alignment with the pace, structure, and ownership expectations of this role.



If selected to move forward, you will receive next steps after your application task is reviewed.



Goal to hire new teammate:  Within the next 3 weeks

title: Investigative Digital Media Researcher
description:
We are a fast-growing digital media production house looking for a sharp, detail-oriented Investigative Researcher to help us identify and curate high-impact stories for our documentary-style content. You won’t just be finding "news"—you’ll be finding the compelling, raw, and high-stakes human interactions that form the backbone of our storytelling.



Key Responsibilities:



Case Scouting: Actively monitor police blotters, court dockets, and local news outlets to identify unique or high-tension i
.

Vetting & Analysis: Evaluate potential stories based on narrative "hooks," legal complexity, and visual potential.



Trend Tracking: Stay ahead of viral news cycles and identifying "under-reported" stories before they go mainstream.



What We’re Looking For:



The "Nose": You can spot a story that people will talk about from a mile away. You understand conflict, resolution, and narrative stakes.



Research Pro: Experience with Local News sites is a massive plus.



Discretion: You can operate quietly and professionally.



Speed: You understand the 24-hour news cycle and can move quickly when a story is "hot."



Preferred Experience:



Background in Journalism, Criminal Justice, or Legal Research.

title: Delivery Lead
description:
Location: Remote (Global) Time Commitment: ~20 hours/week (Flexible hours, strict deadlines) Compensation: Hourly (USD) + Performance Bonuses



High Point is a Toronto-based boutique consulting firm specializing in customer segmentation for growth-stage businesses. Our engagements combine qualitative research (customer interviews, discovery) and quantitative analysis (clustering, modeling) to deliver strategic segmentation frameworks that influence pricing, messaging, product, and GTM decisions.



We’re hiring a Delivery Lead to own execution from kickoff to final delivery.

This is NOT a coordinator role. You will run projects.



What You’ll Own

• Day-to-day client communication (updates, scope clarity, expectations)

• Requirements gathering before analysis begins

• Managing a small team (2–3 analysts/developers)

• Tracking timelines and preventing scope creep

• QA of deliverables before founder review

• Structuring draft decks (clear story, key insights, business implications)



If things are working well:

Clients are confident and informed

The team knows exactly what to build

Deliverables don’t bounce back for major revisions

Founder involvement is minimal



Requirements

• 3+ years managing consulting, agency, or research engagements

• Strong written English (most communication is async)

• Experience turning vague client asks into clear scopes

• Comfortable managing technical contributors (you don’t need to code)

• Strong ownership and judgment



Nice to Have

• Experience in customer research or segmentation

• Experience in hands on data analytics or visualization

• Background in strategy, research, or product

• Experience improving SOPs or delivery processes

• Worked with remote global teams



Logistics

• 15–20 hours per week

• Must dedicated 5 hours per week with North American business hours

• Remote



How to Apply

Send:

2–3 paragraphs on a data/insights heavy project you managed that went well — why it worked

Your proposed rate

A link to a ping white tiger so that I know you've read this :)

title: Video Editor for B2B clothing marketplace
description:
Hi, 



We run Trade Valley, a B2B marketplace that connects clothing brands with manufacturers. We need a part-time video editor to produce 4-5 short-form TikTok videos per week.



30-45 second TikTok videos that showcase clothing manufacturers. The format is simple:



- AI voiceover narrating over product photos/screenshots

- Text overlays highlighting key details (MOQ, product categories, etc.)

- Clean transitions between images

- Background music (trending or lo-fi/chill)

- End card with our logo and "Link in bio"



You will NOT need to:

- Film anything

- Be on camera

- Write scripts (we provide these)

- Source the product photos (we provide these)



**What we provide you each week:**



- Written scripts for each video

- Product photos/screenshots to use

- Brand logo and colours

- Reference videos showing exactly the style we want



**What you deliver:**



- 4-5 finished TikTok videos per week, ready to post

- Vertical format (9:16)

- With captions/subtitles burned in

- With text overlays as specified in the script



**Tools you should know:**



- CapCut (preferred) or DaVinci Resolve 

- Ability to add AI voiceover (using CapCut's built-in AI voice or ElevenLabs — we can provide access)

- Basic text animation, transitions and jump cuts.



**Hours:** Approximately 8-12 hours per week (part-time)



**Experience we're looking for:**



- You've edited TikTok/Reels/Shorts content before (please share examples)

- You understand short-form content pacing — quick cuts, attention-grabbing hooks

- You can follow a script and brief consistently

- Reliable and communicates well

-Here is a link to our tiktok so you can see the type of videos we make -

title: Remote Customer Service & Admin Support for Aviation Tours Company
description:
We are looking for a reliable remote staff member to handle message inquiries that are outside standard New Zealand business hours. You will progress to customer phone enquiries and perform basic administrative tasks during our off-peak hours. You’ll be representing a well-established New Zealand tourism company offering scenic helicopter and floatplane experiences.

 

This role requires strong communication skills, a friendly phone manner, and the ability to work independently during quieter periods.

 

You will be a valued member of a small tight knit team.

 

Responsibilities

 

- Answer inbound customer calls and message (enquiries, pricing, availability, tour details)

- Refer customer inquiry to the appropriate tea
mber

- Respond to
 and message enquiries timely and professionally

- Assist with basic admin work (data entry, confirmations, updating records)

- Coordinate with the on-site team for urgent or complex matters

- Maintain a high standard of customer service at all times

 

Qualifications

 

• Excellent English communication skills

• Confident phone presence

• Stable internet connection and quiet workspace

• Computer literacy in Microsoft and Google suite

• Strong organisational skills

• Ability to work independently

• Experience in customer service or tourism is an advantage

 

Compensation

  

Competitive hourly or monthly rate, depending on experience and availability.

Long-term, stable role for the right candidate.

 

How to Apply

 

Send the following:

• Short introduction

• CV / résumé

• 30–60 sec voice recording introducing yourself and demonstrate your English speaking skills.

• Apply ONLY through onlinejobs.ph. Please DO NOT
 or contact us directly.

 

Cheers,

Ian

title: Remote Takeoff Estimator (MEP)
description:
We are currently looking to add to our growing team. We are a USA-based takeoff & estimating service company. This position is for remote in-house estimators/Quality Control Reps. Please read the job details and respond accordingly to our questions to be considered. Thank you!



We are looking for Immediate Hire:



Position 1: MEP Estimators like Mechanical/HVAC package, electrical, and plumbing.





Job Details-You will be performing takeoffs and some quality control tasks



1. Full-time work available and even over time based on Performance & Quality Of Work-We can offer stable consistent work to the right person (Full Time Preferred)

2. Some training is provided but must have prior experience

3. Must have 5+ Years of experience

4. Must have an engineering or architectural degree or equal estimator experience

5. Must Speak English

6. Must have Planswift Software (No Exception, please don't apply if you don't have this software)

7. Must have good math skills

8. Must be able to work independently in a fast-paced environment

9. Must know how to use Microsoft excel

10. USA takeoff experiences a PLUS but not necessary

11. Must be a team player

12. Must be able to work daytime EST

13. Must be able to work some weekends, depending on workload

14. Must be very responsive

15. Must be reliable and available during your shift.



We have a base starting pay rate per this job post, if you prove your skills we do offer pay raises and bonuses. We also have many management positions to which you can be promoted to.



****To be considered please send the following answered questions****



1. Have you read the job description above thoroughly and can you comply with most requirements?

2. Do you have experience in Mechanical and HVAC takeoffs?. Please elaborate.

3. Tell us about your related experience

4. What is your area of expertise?

5. Why should we hire you?

6. Do you have a home office?

7. How is your internet Speed?

8. How many years of actual takeoff and estimating experience do you have? with US experience?

9. What is your availability and how soon can you start?

title: Remote Takeoff Estimator (MEP)
description:
We are currently looking to add to our growing team. We are a USA-based takeoff & estimating service company. This position is for remote in-house estimators/Quality Control Reps. Please read the job details and respond accordingly to our questions to be considered. Thank you!



We are looking for Immediate Hire:



Position 1: MEP Estimators like Mechanical/HVAC package, electrical, and plumbing.





Job Details-You will be performing takeoffs and some quality control tasks



1. Full-time work available and even over time based on Performance & Quality Of Work-We can offer stable consistent work to the right person (Full Time Preferred)

2. Some training is provided but must have prior experience

3. Must have 5+ Years of experience

4. Must have an engineering or architectural degree or equal estimator experience

5. Must Speak English

6. Must have Planswift Software (No Exception, please don't apply if you don't have this software)

7. Must have good math skills

8. Must be able to work independently in a fast-paced environment

9. Must know how to use Microsoft excel

10. USA takeoff experiences a PLUS but not necessary

11. Must be a team player

12. Must be able to work daytime EST

13. Must be able to work some weekends, depending on workload

14. Must be very responsive

15. Must be reliable and available during your shift.



We have a base starting pay rate per this job post, if you prove your skills we do offer pay raises and bonuses. We also have many management positions to which you can be promoted to.



****To be considered please send the following answered questions****



1. Have you read the job description above thoroughly and can you comply with most requirements?

2. Do you have experience in Mechanical and HVAC takeoffs?. Please elaborate.

3. Tell us about your related experience

4. What is your area of expertise?

5. Why should we hire you?

6. Do you have a home office?

7. How is your internet Speed?

8. How many years of actual takeoff and estimating experience do you have? with US experience?

9. What is your availability and how soon can you start?

title: Hiring: Experienced Shopify Back-End E-commerce Specialist (Immediate Start)
description:
We are hiring an experienced Shopify Back-End E-commerce Specialist for our e-commerce webshop.



This is strictly for professionals with proven Shopify back-end experience.

If you do not have real, hands-on Shopify experience, please do not apply.



We are looking for someone who can start as soon as possible.



About the Role

You will be responsible for managing and optimizing the technical back-end of our Shopify store. We do not manage physical inventory internally. Our operations rely on external partners and systems.



You will work closely with our external agent and must be comfortable coordinating technical tasks, troubleshooting issues, and ensuring seamless operational flow between systems.



This is a results-driven position requiring independence, structure, and technical confidence.



Required Experience

Candidates must have demonstrated experience with:



- Shopify back-end management

- Shopify admin configuration and optimization

- Payment gateway setup and troubleshooting

- Order flow management inside Shopify

- App and plugin configuration

- API integrations

- Automation workflows

- Data accuracy and system checks

- Working with external partners or agents

- You must understand how the full Shopify order flow works from checkout to fulfillment coordination.



Responsibilities

Manage and optimize Shopify back-end settings



Oversee order processing inside Shopify



Ensure payment providers function correctly



Coordinate with our external agent regarding order handling



Maintain and monitor Shopify apps and integrations



Identify and resolve technical issues



Improve automation and operational efficiency



Prevent checkout errors or disruptions



Ensure accurate data flow between systems



Provide structured reporting when needed



Candidate Profile

Proven Shopify back-end experience



Highly organized and technically competent



Strong communication skills for coordination with external agent



Independent and proactive



Detail-oriented and solution-driven



Available for immediate start



Application Requirements



To be considered, you must send:



Your resume

Your current or most recent positions

Examples of Shopify stores you have worked on

Your earliest possible start date

Your expected compensation

Incomplete applications will not be reviewed.



We are hiring immediately. Experienced Shopify professionals only.

description:

Our private pediatric dental office is looking for an experienced dental ( 2 years + ) insurance coordinator to oversee our insurance, collections, and AR. If you do NOT have dental insurance, we will not respond to your message.



We specialize in creating positive dental experiences for children. We're currently seeking a motivated and compassionate tea

- Assist in resolving patient billing complaints and issues.

**** Must have dental 2 years experience dealing with PPO, Texas MEDICAID & CHIP

title: AI-Powered Video Content Modernisation
description:
1. Project Overview & Trial Scope



We are an established Human Resources Consulting practice in Australia with online module content. We have reconfigured two core courses ach of them needing an avatar and a specific voice over that mimics our speaker who appears on other videos as a live presenter. 



Pilot Goal: To adapt one (1) trial video into a new format where the entire audio is replaced by the speaker's cloned voice, and the visuals feature AI-generated B-roll and a Custom AI Avatar of the speaker (sample will be provided).



Content Library State: We currently subscribed to ElevenLabs and HeyGen and can give you access to those subscriptions for this work and access to existing scripts. The average duration is approximately 4.6 minutes per video.





2. Key Creative Deliverables for the Trial Video



The contractor must deliver a fully edited video that meets these outcomes:



-Audio Replacement (Voice Cloning is Required): The contractor must use AI Voice Cloning technology to create the new voiceover in a voice cloned to sound like the original speaker. Same Australian accent (ideally)



-Custom AI Avatar Creation: Integrate a Custom AI Avatar (or digital spokesperson) to deliver key parts of the new narrative. The Avatar must be generated based on one of the following specifications:

   -An avatar generated to look like the original speaker



-Visual Enhancement (AI B-Roll): Generate new video clips (B-roll) using text prompts. These AI clips must be seamlessly edited over the speaker's footage to enhance the narrative.

  

-Final Delivery: Provide the final, high-resolution MP4 video file and a folder containing all original source files and all generated AI assets as the pilot and if successful for each video thereafter.





3. Tools & Collaboration (Flexible Workflow & Ownership)



We require the AI generation to use our system, but the assembly can use the contractor's preferred editor.



-Tool Flexibility and Editing Software: The contractor has the flexibility to use their preferred professional video editing software for the assembly of the final video. The contractor may also use their own preferred tools for initial preparation, but all final AI B-roll and script creation must be accounted for using the client-provided AI access (Note: We subscribed to HeyGen and ElevenLabs).





4. Contractor Profile



We require a highly creative, technically proficient editor who can demonstrate mastery in advanced production workflows and cutting-edge Generative AI techniques, who can also deal with quality, volume and working to deadlines:



-Required Skills: Proven expertise in professional video editing and high-fidelity AI Voice Cloning for precise voice replication and audio integration. At least Intermediate English Skills, written and verbal.



-AI-Powered Asset Creation: Expertise in prompting and directing generative image and video AI tools (e.g., Veo 3, HeyGen or similar) to acquire highly specific, and visually consistent assets.

title: AI & Automation Specialist
description:
PropZap is building a next-generation real estate platform designed to expand across North America.



We are not building another traditional brokerage.



We are building a company powered by systems, automation, AI, and intelligent infrastructure — designed to scale across markets without breaking under growth.



We believe the future of business is not manual.



It is automated.

It is intelligent.

It is context-aware.

It compounds over time.



As we expand, the systems behind the company must become smarter, not heavier.



And that’s where you come in.



--------------------------------------------------------------



Role: AI Automation & GoHighLevel Specialist

Location: Remote

Role Type: Flexible

Compensation: 50,000 PHP+



We believe exceptional builders deserve exceptional compensation. For the right person who can architect intelligent automation that truly reduces manual workload and strengthens operations, we are willing to pay premium for capability and execution.



Company: PropZap — Building the next-generation real estate platform for North America



--------------------------------------------------------------



Why This Role Is a Big Opportunity



This is not a basic automation setup role.



This is about building intelligent infrastructure.



You won’t just connect triggers and actions.



You’ll design how AI interacts with real business workflows.

You’ll map logic trees that determine how issues are routed.

You’ll structure systems that reduce manual friction.

You’ll help build automation that actually replaces repetitive processes.



As the company grows, automation becomes more critical — not less.



And the person who builds that system grows with it.



If you’ve been implementing automations but want to design smarter, deeper systems — this is that step.



If you want your work to power real operational scale — not just marketing funnels — this will feel meaningful.



--------------------------------------------------------------



What We’re Building



We are building AI-driven automation systems using:



• GoHighLevel (GHL)

• AI Voice Agents (within GoHighLevel)

• CRM automation workflows

• Ticketing logic

• Custom fields & conditional logic

•
 notification systems

• Conditional routing workflows

• Systemble (for outbound automation support)

Agentic AI

• Time tracking tools



The vision is simple:



A call comes in ?

AI answers ?

Information is structured ?

Tickets are created or updated ?

Departments are notified ?

Escalations trigger automatically ?

AI references stored context when the customer calls back.



Less back-and-forth.

More intelligence.

More scalability.



--------------------------------------------------------------



What You’ll Be Doing



You will work directly with leadership to:



• Build and refine AI voice agents inside GoHighLevel

• Improve AI note capture and CRM integration

• Automate ticket creation and dynamic ticket updates

• Design routing logic (issue type ? correct department)

• Create escalation workflows for complex scenarios

• Set up automated notifications triggered by call outcomes

• Implement custom field logic to track fulfillment stages

• Enable AI to reference stored CRM data in follow-up conversations

• Build outbound AI call workflows (where regionally permitted)

• Map full automation architecture from first interaction to resolution



You won’t just implement steps.



You’ll design how the system thinks.



Who This Role Is Built For



Someone who understands automation beyond surface level.



Someone who thinks in workflows, logic trees, and decision paths.



Someone who sees inefficiencies and immediately imagines a smarter system.



--------------------------------------------------------------



Required Experience:

• GoHighLevel (GHL)

• AI voice agent setup

• CRM automation workflows

• Custom fields and conditional logic

• Ticketing systems

•
 automation

• Inbound and outbound call workflows



Strongly Preferred:

• Experience building ISA-style or AI-driven sales workflows

• Experience with AI-generated call notes and structured escalation

• Ability to independently map automation architecture

• Comfort working with evolving AI tools



You don’t need a corporate background.



You need systems thinking.



--------------------------------------------------------------



What You Gain



• The opportunity to architect intelligent automation systems

• Work on real operational use cases, not just surface funnels

• The ability to build infrastructure that scales

• Collaboration on automation projects that can expand in scope

• Compensation aligned with skill, execution, and impact



Imagine building automation that replaces hours of manual work every day.



Imagine designing systems that handle complexity automatically.



Imagine being the person who makes growth smoother, faster, and smarter.



That’s the opportunity here.



--------------------------------------------------------------



How to Apply



Send the following to: 



• Resume

• Portfolio (required — include automation examples or case studies)

• Summary of GoHighLevel experience

• Description of AI voice workflows you’ve implemented

• Expected hourly rate

• Internet speed test link



Subject Line: AI Automation Specialist – Your Name



If you want to build intelligent systems that power real businesses — and be compensated at a premium for doing it well — we should talk.

title: SEO / SEM Content Creation Specialist
description:
We are an Australian based company with 20 years experience managing a number of ecommerce websites. We are currently seeking the services of a top level SEO/SEM Professional to take responsibility for the growth of a new e-commerce website we have just launched.



Our preference is for a loyal, stable & reliable full time person that is looking for a long term relationship. 



Essentially you will be solely responsible for the growth and success of this new E-commerce website. Your duties will include:-

1. Conducting comprehensive website analysis, keyword research, and competitor analysis 

2. Developing and implementing effective strategies to improve organic search rankings and AI citations, drive website traffic, generate leads & website sales.

3. Create & optimize relevant content

4. Set up & optimize effective PPC advertising campaigns across various platforms (Google Ads, Bing Ads, social media ads) to drive sales.

5. Perform GBP/GMB Optimisation & develop Local Citations and Link Building





Position Requirements:

- Minimum 3 years experience in SEO / SEM and content creation.

- Demonstratable expertise with the latest SEO techniques and strategies.

- Demonstratable experience in improving traffic and conversions.

- Experienced with Google Analytics, Search Console & Merchant console.

- Experience working with WordPress and WooCommerce.

- Workable understanding of website development, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

- Experience working with Semrush, Moz, Ubersuggest or similar. We use Ubersuggest currently.

- Good English and availability during Melbourne Australia business hours for effective communication.

- You will need a good internet connection & computer setup.



In addition to the above, We require the successful applicant to be a highly organized self-starter, able to work unsupervised, and able to set goals & develop processes around the role.



Remuneration for this role is negotiable, dependent on experience and expertise. 



To apply, please send an
 to 
 introducing yourself and provide answers to the following:-



1. Explain why you are an ideal candidate for this position giving brief details of your relevant experience.

2. Share an example of a website you have managed the SEO on and provide details of the results achieved.

3. State your preference for the hours you prefer to work, and the remuneration you are seeking.





If you are passionate about SEO/SEM, have a track record of driving results, and are looking for a long-term relationship with a stable and reputable company, We look forward to hearing from you.



Whilst we appreciate all applications, only shortlisted candidates will receive a reply.



Thank you

title: US Tax & Accounting Specialist (CPA Preferred)
description:
If you have only done basic bookkeeping, do not apply.

If you have never handled real US tax compliance, do not apply.

If you cannot explain US LLC taxation without Googling it, do not apply.



We are hiring a high-level Philippine-based accounting professional with real, hands-on experience in US tax compliance and financial management.



Who We Are:

Caring Hands Home Health LLC is a Texas-based home health agency in growth mode. We need someone who understands numbers, compliance, cash flow, and accountability. This is not a clerical role.



You will work directly with executive leadership. Accuracy is non-negotiable.



What You MUST Have:

Before applying, confirm you have handled the following:

- US LLC taxation (Single-member and multi-member) experience

Preparation or assistance with:

  - Form 1065

  - Form 1120 / 1120S

  - Schedule C

  - 1099-NEC preparation

  - Payroll tax filings (941, 940)

- QuickBooks Online advanced proficiency

- US payroll systems experience (Gusto, ADP, or similar)

- Bank reconciliation at scale

- Monthly financial reporting for US clients

- Experience meeting IRS deadlines without supervision

** If you cannot confidently say yes to these, this role is not for you. **



Responsibilities

You will own:

- Full bookkeeping cycle

- Monthly close process

- Financial statement preparation

- Payroll tax compliance

- 1099 and contractor compliance

- Budgeting and forecasting support

- Profitability analysis

- Cash flow tracking

- Internal financial controls

You will not wait for instructions. You will identify issues and fix them.



Performance Standards

You will be measured on:

- Zero missed tax deadlines

- Clean reconciliations

- Accurate financial reporting

- Clear executive reporting

- Response time under 24 hours

- Error rate below 1%



Compensation



Competitive PH salary for A-level talent.

Long-term stability.

Growth into senior financial controller role as company scales.



If you are average, this will feel demanding.

If you are elite, this is opportunity.



To Apply



Send:

- Detailed list of US tax forms you have handled personally

- Example of a monthly financial report you created (remove confidential info)

- What was the most complex US tax issue you resolved?

- Confirm you can overlap 4 hours with US CST time



Applications without detailed answers will be ignored.

title: B2B Growth Operations Assistant (UK Professional Services Focus | 4 Hours/Day)
description:
B2B Growth Operations & Paid Ads Assistant



(UK Professional Services Focus | 4 Hours/Day | Data-Driven Role)



We are a UK-based B2B technology platform operating in the professional services sector.



We are looking for a disciplined, detail-oriented Growth Operations Assistant to support structured outbound activity, paid advertising management, and CRM integrity.



This is NOT a creative social media role.

This is NOT a content creation position.



This is a structured, performance-driven execution role.



Core Responsibilities



You will support daily growth operations including:



1?? CRM & Pipeline Discipline



• Updating CRM after outbound activity

• Ensuring mandatory next-action dates are set

• Tagging and stage control

• Identifying stagnation risks

• Daily KPI tracking



2?? LinkedIn & Instagram Structured Outreach



• Following targeted UK professional firms daily

• Connecting with Directors and decision-makers

• Sending structured, non-spam outreach messages

• Tracking response rates

• Managing follow-up timing inside CRM

• Avoiding account flags and spam behaviour



This is controlled B2B outreach, not influencer engagement.



3?? Google Ads (AdWords) Support



• Monitoring active campaigns

• Reviewing search term reports

• Flagging irrelevant traffic

• Updating negative keyword lists

• Basic bid adjustment support

• Tracking conversion metrics

• Preparing weekly performance summaries



You are not required to build strategy — but you must understand campaign structure and performance metrics.



4?? Lead Generation & List Building



• Using Apollo / Snov / LinkedIn Sales Navigator

• Cleaning and enriching data

• Structuring target firm lists

• Segment tagging



Required Experience



You MUST have:



• Experience working with UK-based B2B companies

• CRM platform experience (HubSpot, Attio, Pipedrive, GHL or similar)

• Experience managing or supporting Google Ads campaigns

• Experience performing structured LinkedIn outreach

• Strong written English (C1 minimum)

• Comfort working under measurable daily KPIs



Bonus (Highly Valued)



• Experience supporting founder-led outbound

• Experience targeting professional service firms

• Basic understanding of UK market terminology

• Understanding of ad conversion tracking



Working Structure



• 4 hours per day

• Must overlap 2–3 hours with UK time

• Long-term role

• Clear daily measurable targets

• Performance-based pay progression



Who This Role Is For



• Process-driven operators

• Metric-focused individuals

• Structured thinkers

• People comfortable with accountability

• Candidates who prefer systems over creativity



Who This Role Is NOT For



• Canva-only social media managers

• Influencer marketers

• Pure content creators

• Generic VAs with no ads experience



Compensation



$7–10/hour depending on experience

Performance increases available after 60–90 days based on measurable impact.



Application Instructions (Mandatory)



Please answer clearly:



What CRM platforms have you used and at what level?

title: Cold Calling Sales Specialist
description:
We are a growing short-term rental management company looking for a long-term Cold Calling Specialist.



Your role will be to call property owners in the United States, introduce our services, qualify leads, and book follow-up calls for the company. This is a performance-driven position with strong commission and bonus potential.



This job requires:

– Excellent spoken English

– A neutral or minimal accent

– Confidence on the phone

– Strong communication skills

– High consistency and resilience

– Ability to follow scripts and improve with feedback

– Stable internet and a quiet workspace



Your responsibilities:

– Make 100–150 outbound calls per day

– Speak with property owners and identify decision makers

– Track calls inside our spreadsheet system

– Identify warm and hot leads

– Schedule follow-up appointments

– Report daily results

– Work closely with management to improve scripts and performance



What we offer:

– Base pay monthly

– Commission per closed deal (high earning potential)

– Bonus structure for hitting monthly targets

– Clear training, scripts, and support

– Long-term position with promotions for strong performers



This position is ideal for someone who:

– Has previous cold calling experience (preferred but not required)

– Wants long-term stability

– Enjoys talking to people

– Sales Experience

– Is motivated by high commission potential



IMPORTANT:

You must submit a voice recording to be considered (introduce yourself for 20–30 seconds).

title: Long-Form YouTube Video Editor (AI Video / Veo3).
description:
HEY..

I run multiple YouTube channels focused on history, military stories, and educational content. Long-form videos, 15-25 minutes each. Documentary style with AI-generated visuals.

I need someone who can take my scripts and turn them into finished, cinematic YouTube videos using AI video tools — primarily Google Veo3 (or similar tools like Runway, Kling, etc.)

I handle all scripting. You handle everything else: AI video generation, editing, pacing, music, sound design, and final delivery.

This is NOT traditional video editing. You won't be cutting raw camera footage. You'll be creating visuals from scratch using AI prompts, then assembling them into a polished, cinematic video.

????????????????????????????????????????????????????

WHAT YOU'LL ACTUALLY DO (real talk)

????????????????????????????????????????????????????

Your typical week:

? You receive 15 scripts with visual instructions fro

? For each script, you generate AI video clips using Veo3 (or similar tools)

? You edit everything together: AI clips + stock footage + music + sound effects

? You maintain consistent pacing, narrative structure, and cinematic feel

? You deliver 15 finished videos per week (60/month total)

Each video is 15-25 minutes long, documentary/storytelling style.

Tools you'll use:



Google Veo3 (primary AI video generation — I provide access)

CapCut, Premiere Pro, or DaVinci Resolve (editing)

Stock footage sources (Pexels, Pixabay — I'll guide you)

Google Drive / Dropbox (file sharing)

Slack or
 (communication)



Output expected:



60 finished videos per month (15/week)

Consistent quality across all videos

Each video ready to upload — no additional editing needed fro



????????????????????????????????????????????????????

STYLE REFERENCE — THIS IS WHAT YOUR WORK SHOULD LOOK LIKE

????????????????????????????????????????????????????

Watch these channels carefully. This is the quality, pacing, and storytelling level I expect:

? 

? 

? 

? 
/channel/UCSD1CZO5lg5O4FNBmbi15Mw

Key style elements:



Documentary / educational storytelling

Strong hooks in the first 30 seconds

AI-generated visuals blended with stock footage

Professional sound design (music + ambient effects)

Clean, cinematic editing — no flashy transitions, no 
 edits

Structured narrative that keeps viewers watching



If you watch those channels and think "I can do this" — keep reading.

If you watch them and feel lost — this isn't for you. No hard feelings.

????????????????????????????????????????????????????

WHO YOU ARE (must-haves)

????????????????????????????????????????????????????

 You have real experience with AI video generation tools (Veo3, Runway, Kling, Pika, or similar)

 You can write effective AI prompts that produce cinematic, consistent results

 You understand narrative structure — you know how to pace a 20-minute story

 You can edit 10+ minute long-form videos (not TikToks, not Reels — real YouTube content)

 You use music and sound effects strategically, not randomly

 You work independently — I send you a script, you deliver a finished video

 You suggest creative improvements instead of just following instructions blindly

 NOT a fit if:

? You've never used AI video tools (this is not a training position)

? You only do short-form content (under 5 minutes)

? You need step-by-step instructions for every single scene

? You can't handle feedback or revisions

? You disappear for days without communication

????????????????????????????????????????????????????

WHAT YOU GET

????????????????????????????????????????????????????

 Pay: Starting at $400/month

? If your quality is consistently high, salary increases. This is not a ceiling, it's a starting point.

? Top performer can realistically reach $
/month within 3-6 months.

 Volume: 60 videos/month (15/week)

 Location: Remote, any timezone (but deadlines are deadlines)

 Growth: I'm scaling to more channels. Good work = more work = more pay.

 Start: This week if you're ready

 Bonus: This is a long-term position. I'm not looking for a one-month freelancer. I want someone who grows with the channels.

????????????????????????????????????????????????????

HOW TO APPLY (read this carefully — seriously)

????????????????????????????????????????????????????

DO NOT send a generic "I'm interested" message.

I get hundreds of those. They all go straight to trash.

Instead, do this:

 Write the word "GLACIER" at the very top of your message.

? This proves you actually read the whole post. No GLACIER = I won't read your application.

 Send me at least one longer video (8+ minutes) that YOU personally edited.

? Bonus points if it uses AI-generated visuals.

? If you don't have a long-form sample, don't apply.

 Briefly explain:

? What software do you use for editing?

? What's your experience with AI video tools? (Which ones? How long?)

? How do you approach structuring a long-form video from a script?

 Watch one of the reference channels above and tell me:

? What do they do well?

? What would you do differently?

 Applications without "GLACIER" at the top = automatically ignored. No exceptions.

????????????????????????????????????????????????????

WHY WORK WITH ME?

????????????????????????????????????????????????????

Honest truth:

 I pay on time, every month. No chasing, no excuses.

 I give clear, specific feedback — not vague "make it better" nonsense.

 Steady, consistent work — not a random one-off project.

 I handle all the scripting — you focus purely on the visual/editing side.

 Room to grow as channels scale.

 I'm picky about quality. If pacing is off, I'll ask for revisions.

 Volume is real — 60 videos/month means you need to be efficient.

 I expect communication — if something is delayed, tell me before the deadline, not after.

If you understand structure, pacing, AI tools, and storytelling — we can build something long-term together.

If this sounds like you, apply now.

If not, no hard feelings — save us both the time.

George

title: Licensed Mental Health Professionals Wanted
description:
AccrediPro University (accredipro.academy) is an internationally accredited online certification platform with 5,000+ enrolled students and accreditation partnerships with CMA, CTAA, The CPD Group, IPHM, IHTCP, IIOHT, and others.

We are recruiting PRC-licensed mental health professionals to join our pool of Curriculum Reviewers across our certified course catalog.



SPECIALIZATIONS WE'RE RECRUITING FOR:

ADHD Support · Anxiety & Stress Management · Depression & Mood Disorders · PTSD & Trauma Recovery · Grief & Bereavement Counseling · Narcissistic Abuse Recovery · Addiction & Substance Abuse Recovery · Eating Disorders · EMDR Therapy · Gestalt Therapy · Somatic Therapy · Nervous System Regulation · Hypnotherapy · CBT · DBT · Play Therapy · Family & Marriage Counseling · Crisis Intervention · Mindfulness-Based Approaches

The more specializations you cover, the more courses you may qualify for.



REQUIREMENTS:

Active PRC license: RPsych (Registered Psychologist) or RGC (Registered Guidance Counselor). Your license will be verified via 
.

Don't hold RPsych or RGC but have other recognized credentials in mental health or counseling? We evaluate relevant, verifiable professional licenses and certifications on a case-by-case basis — send us your details.



WHAT YOU'LL DO:

? Review specific sections of courses in your area of expertise — when existing courses are updated or new courses are developed

? Provide your professional opinion on proposed content changes before they go live

? You are never assigned an entire course — only sections relevant to your specialization

? Each area is reviewed by multiple Curriculum Reviewers to ensure quality and plurality of perspectives

? You are free to accept or decline any review request based on your availability



COMPENSATION:

? Annual fee: $80 USD, paid upon finalized agreement

? Active review work: $4–5 USD/hour, agreed based on volume of material



TO APPLY:

Send a message with:

Full name and PRC license number

Your specialization areas (from the list above)

LinkedIn profile link (if available)

Any additional certifications (EMDR, Somatic Experiencing, trauma-informed care, etc.)

title: Lead Virtual Assistant – Real Estate Operations
description:
Hyman Properties is an active real estate investment company focused on wholesaling residential properties and vacant land across multiple U.S. states.



We are hiring a Lead Virtual Assistant to run day-to-day operations, manage data and VAs, and help refine systems. This role is for someone who understands real estate operations end-to-end — not just tasks.



If you need step-by-step instructions for everything, this role is not a fit.



?



What You’ll Own

 • Seller & buyer list pulling and organization

 • Google Sheets systems (buyers, sellers, KPIs, VA logs)

 • Oversight of cold callers and data VAs

 • Data quality control (clean, usable lists)

 • Daily performance tracking and reporting

 • Flagging issues before they become problems

 • Improving workflows as volume increases



?



Minimum Requirements (Non-Negotiable)



? 2+ years as a Real Estate VA

? Hands-on experience with wholesaling and/or vacant land

? Personally pulled lists using PropStream, BatchLeads, PropWire, or similar

? Comfortable managing multiple VAs

? Strong Google Sheets skills

? Able to think independently and explain why you do things



???? If your experience is limited to admin work or social media, do not apply.



?



How to Apply



 

Subject line:

Lead Real Estate VA – Application – [Your Name]



Applications without thoughtful, specific answers will not be reviewed.



?



Application Questions 



Answer clearly and specifically. Short or generic answers will be rejected.

 1. How many years have you worked as a real estate VA, and what deal types were involved (wholesale, land, flips, rentals, etc.)?

 2. List every real estate platform you have personally used and explain what you used each one for.

 3. You are asked to pull a vacant land seller list in one county for an investor who wants motivated sellers.

 • Which platform do you choose and why?

 • List at least 6 filters you would apply and explain the purpose of each.

 4. How do you verify that a list is high quality before it is skip-traced or sent to cold callers?

 5. Describe your exact process for organizing buyers across multiple states so they can be matched to deals quickly.

 6. You have 3 cold callers working 3 hours per day.

 • What KPIs do you track daily and weekly?

 • What numbers would signal a problem?

 7. Describe a real system, SOP, or workflow you personally built or improved for a real estate investor.

 8. If list performance drops suddenly, what are the first 3 things you check?

 9. What time zone are you in, and how many hours per day can you commit consistently?

 10. Why should we trust you to operate at a lead level instead of a task-based VA role?

        11. What are some of the states you have done cold calling in?

title: Senior Google Ads Media Buyer (UK Fashion E-commerce dropshipping) — Shopping/PMax + Merchant Center (Profit First)
description:
We are building a UK-based general fashion e-commerce store (dropshipping model) and we’re looking for a senior Google Ads media buyer who can take us from 0 ? stable profitable days with a disciplined, profit-first approach.



This is NOT an entry-level role. We only want someone with a real, proven track record running Google Ads for e-commerce.



Our current stage (important context)

- UK market, general fashion store (broad catalog)

- Shopify (dropshipping)

- We are expanding the catalog in a controlled way to keep things healthy/compliant:

   - 25 products/day until ~500–600 products

   - Then we switch to 50 products/week (batch uploads)

- We need someone who understands how catalog growth impacts Merchant Center + Shopping/PMax performance and can manage this properly.



Your mission

Build and manage a Google Ads system that becomes consistently profitable and scalable, while keeping waste low and compliance strong.



Responsibilities

- Audit & fix: Google Ads account structure, tracking, Merchant Center/feed health

- Launch + manage: Shopping / Performance Max / Search (only what makes sense)

- Feed optimization: titles, attributes, product types, disapprovals, diagnostics

- Profit-first optimization: reduce wasted spend, improve CVR/CPA/ROAS, search term control

- Weekly reporting (clear & concise) + action plan



Hard requirements (do not apply if you can’t prove these)

- 3+ years hands-on Google Ads for e-commerce

- Strong experience with Shopping + Performance Max + Merchant Center

- Experience with dropshipping / tight margins

- Ability to work independently and make smart decisions with limited budget

- You MUST show proof: screenshots/case studies with metrics (redact sensitive info)



Payment terms (non-negotiable)

- We pay monthly only, at the end of the month

- Compensation options:

   1. Fixed monthly retainer (agreed upfront), OR

   2. 10% of ad spend (paid end of month)



If you cannot accept monthly end-of-month payment, please do not apply.



How to apply (required)

Include ALL of the following:

1. Short intro (2–5 lines)

2. 2–3 proof examples (store type, market, spend range, results, timeframe)

3. Your first 14-day plan for a UK general fashion store while the catalog is growing

4. Your preferred compensation option (retainer or 10% of ad spend)

5. Confirm you accept monthly end-of-month payment



IMPORTANT FILTER

To prove you read everything, start your application with this exact phrase:

“BLUEBERRY CHECK — Fully Read.”

Applications without this will be ignored.

title: Fast Framer & Figma Specialist - High-Speed Website & Dashboard Recreations
description:
We are looking for a designer who works with extreme speed and precision. The layouts are already done—you will be given reference images of 5 websites and 5 dashboards to recreate exactly.



Your goal: 1. Replicate the reference image 100% (pixel-perfect) in Framer or Figma.

2. Once the "clone" is done, apply a few minor final changes.



Requirements:



Speed is Priority: You should be able to look at a screenshot and build the layout immediately without "guessing" where elements go.



Tool Mastery: Expert-level use of Framer (Stacks/Breakpoints) and Figma (Auto-layout/Components).



Attention to Detail: You must notice the small things (shadows, border-radius, font-weights) the first time so we don't waste time on revisions.



This is an initial contract for 10 total projects. If you are fast and the quality is high, there is a lot more work coming.

title: Full-Stack Data Engineer (Python / FastAPI / SQL) – Restaurant Analytics Dashboard
description:
We operate a fast-growing beverage concept in California and are building an internal operating system to power multi-store expansion.



We are looking for a highly capable Full-Stack Data Engineer to help design and build our internal analytics dashboard.



This is NOT a basic web developer role.



You will help build a real-time operating intelligence system that integrates:



• Toast POS API

• 7shifts (labor scheduling)

• Inventory and recipe cost tables

• Customer loyalty and retention data

• Review sentiment tracking



Your work will directly impact business decisions, expansion strategy, labor optimization, and profitability.



This is a long-term role for someone who thinks architecturally, not just executes tasks.



RESPONSIBILITIES



• Design and implement data pipelines (API ? database ? metrics ? dashboard)

• Build and maintain FastAPI backend services

• Design clean and scalable PostgreSQL schemas

• Implement metric calculations (CPLH, contribution margin, retention rates, etc.)

• Create dashboards (React frontend preferred)

• Build alert systems (threshold-based notifications)

• Write clean, documented, maintainable code

• Proactively suggest architecture improvements



REQUIRED EXPERIENCE



• Strong Python development experience

• Experience integrating external APIs

• Strong SQL knowledge

• Experience building dashboards or analytics systems

• Experience designing database schemas

• Able to work independently and propose solutions



Bonus:

• Experience with POS systems

• Experience with ETL/data pipelines

• Familiarity with FastAPI

• Familiarity with React

title: Operations, Workflow, and Systems Coordinator
description:
We are a boutique, luxury inn located in the heart of Pensacola’s historic district, offering an elevated blend of Southern hospitality, curated experiences, and thoughtful, design-forward comfort. Rooted in family legacy and a passion for refined guest care, we have quickly become a haven for travelers seeking warmth, beauty, and a truly personal touch. From chef-crafted breakfasts to intimate seasonal events and immersive cultural experiences, every detail is intentionally crafted to inspire connection, relaxation, and a sense of home. As we continue to grow, we’re building a team of individuals who care deeply about hospitality, excellence, and creating 
nts that feel unforgettable.



The Operations, Workflow & Systems Coordinator is the architect behind our daily workflow, communication rhythm, guest experience systems, and marketing organization. This is not an administrative assistant role — it is a creator role.



The person in this position will design the internal backbone of a boutique, luxury bed and breakfast where hospitality, culinary excellence, and refined guest experiences come together. They will build processes, create templates, implement systems, and maintain rhythm across all departments so the Owner can remain hands-off while operations run smoothly and cohesively.



This role requires someone who thinks like a systems builder, organizes like a project manager, communicates like a hospitality professional, and operates with a deep sense of ownership.



Core Responsibilities

1. Systems Building & Workflow Creation

You will build the operational infrastructure of Celestine, including:

- Checklists for Guest Experience, Housekeeping, Culinary support, and Events

- SOPs for check-ins, check-outs, room readiness, and breakfast coordination

- Templates for guest communication, team updates, and internal documentation

- Workflows that streamline coordination between leads and departments

- A central digital hub where all documents, schedules, and SOPs live

- Improved systems for consistency, quality, and team alignment

Your role is to create, not just maintain.



2. Operational Coordination & Calendar Management

Build and maintain the master scheduling system for:

- Check-ins and check-outs

- Housekeeping and room turnovers

- Breakfast staffing

- Events and workshops

- Tea
etings

Ensure all tea
mbers always have correct, up-to-date schedules



Anticipate operational needs before they arise



You own the coordination that keeps the entire business synchronized.



3. Communication & Documentation Development

- Create standardized guest communication flows (pre-arrival, stay updates, checkout)

- Maintain the communication library in Celestine’s brand voice

- Draft agendas for weekly meetings and document action items

- Write internal updates for the team

- Produce templates for event communication, vendor coordination, and internal notes

- Create social media and newsletter content

- You help maintain a smooth, polished communication experience across the business and communicate directly with customers.



4. Data Tracking, Reporting & Accountability Support

- Build the operations dashboard (weekly and monthly)

- Track occupancy, revenue, guest feedback trends, and team performance metrics

- Monitor progress toward monthly and quarterly goals

- Identify gaps and propose improvements

- Support light accountability by circulating reminders, deadlines, and summaries

- You create visibility into the health of the business.



5. Marketing Organization & Content Workflow Design

- Build the social media content calendar system

- Organize photos and videos into labeled content libraries

- Set up workflows for content creation, approvals, and posting

- Coordinate with the Owner, Culinary Lead, and Guest Experience Lead to gather content

- Track content performance monthly

- You will organize the marketing engine.



6. Event & Experience Support

- Build event playbooks for brunches, tasting dinners, workshops, and seasonal experiences

- Create event coordination templates

- Track guest registrations, vendor communication, and timelines

- Capture feedback and update systems for future events

- You help standardize the event experience so each one runs flawlessly.

- Develop proposals in response to private event inquiries.
